metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6674 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer underflow vulnerability in the Debian inspircd package before 2.0.5-1+deb7u1 for wheezy and before 2.0.16-1 for jessie and sid. NOTE: This issue exists as an additional issue from an incomplete fix of CVE-2012-1836.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6674` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

inspircd - 2.0.5-1+deb7u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: inspircd package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.5-1+deb7u1build0.14.04.1').
